spamLoggingEnabled.description: Enable/Disable Spam Level Logs in the SVW Data Console

infoLoggingEnabled.description: Enable/Disable Info Level Logs in the SVW Data Console

errorLoggingEnabled.description: Enable/Disable Error Level Logs in the SVW Data Console

customLoggingEnabled.description: Enable/Disable Custom Level Logs in the SVW Data Console

implausibleThresholdInterval.description: Threshold in Time (in miliseconds) after which the VCU will enter the implausible state

readyToDriveSoundDuration.description: The duration (in miliseconds) of ready to drive sound

readyToDriveTriggeringBrakeThreshold.description: The percentage of braking needed to enter ready to drive mode

readyToDriveButtonPort.description: GPIO Port of ready to drive button

readyToDriveButtonPinNum.description: GPIO Pin Number of ready to drive button

readyToDriveSoundPort.description: GPIOPort of ready to drive sound buzzer

readyToDriveSoundPinNum.description: GPIO Pin Number of ready to drive sound buzzer

ThrottleMinPin0.description: Minimum analog value of the first APPS

ThrottleMaxPin0.description: Maximum analog value of the first APPS

ThrottleMinPin1.description: Minimum analog value of the second APPS

ThrottleMaxPin1.description: Maximum analog value of the second APPS

MaxTorque.description: Maximum torque of the motor in the unit of 0.1 Nm (e.g. 1000 means 100 Nm of torque from the engine)

ThrottleSignalOutOfRangeThreshold.description: Threshold for APPS to go out of range in analog value

ThrottleSignalDeviationThreshold.description: Threshold for APPS's deviation to be considered as implausible in analog value

SignalDeadzone.description: Deadzone of the APPS in analog value

BrakeMinPin.description: Minimum analog value of the brake sensor

BrakeMaxPin.description: Maximum analog value of the brake sensor

BrakeSignalOutOfRangeThreshold.description: Threshold for the brake sensor to go out of range in analog value

RegenMinPin.description: Minimum analog value of the regen sensor

RegenMaxPin.description: Maximum analog value of the regen sensor

MaxRegen.description: Maximum regen to the motor in the unit of 0.1 Nm
